title: Individual User Signup with Email Verification
description: Verify that individual users can successfully sign up by agreeing to terms, completing profile setup, and verifying email, then proceed to login.

steps.description: Navigate to individual user signup page
Agree to terms and conditions
Fill in profile setup information with valid data
Submit signup form
Verify that an email verification prompt is shown
Simulate clicking on valid verification link
Check that email is verified successfully
Navigate to login page and enter credentials
Submit login form
Check that login is successful and user is redirected to dashboard

title: Company Signup Two-Step Process
description: Ensure companies can complete signup by agreeing to terms and providing detailed company and contact information, resulting in account creation.

steps.description: Go to company signup initial page
Agree to company-specific terms and conditions
Proceed to company details form
Fill in company and contact info with valid inputs
Submit company signup form
Confirm account creation success message
Attempt login with newly created company credentials
Verify successful login and access to company dashboard

title: Login Flow for Individual and Company Users with Remember Me Option
description: Test standard email login for both individual and company users including remember me functionality affecting token storage location.

steps.description: Navigate to individual login page
Input valid user credentials
Select 'remember me' checkbox
Submit login form
Verify login success and token stored in localStorage
Logout user
Navigate to company login page
Input valid company credentials
Do not select 'remember me' checkbox
Submit login form
Verify login success and token stored in sessionStorage

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid email/password for both individual and company users and proper error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Go to individual login page
Input invalid email and/or password
Submit login form
Check error toast notification or message indicating login failure
Navigate to company login page
Input incorrect company credentials
Submit login form
Verify display of user-friendly login failure message

title: Google OAuth Login Flow Success and Failure
description: Test Google OAuth login for both user types, covering successful login and handling of authentication failure scenarios.

steps.description: Click on Google OAuth login button for individual user
Complete OAuth sign-in with valid Google account
Verify successful login and token receipt
Repeat OAuth login for company user
Simulate OAuth failure or cancel
Verify user sees error notification and no authentication token is stored

title: Resume Creation and Editing with Dynamic Sections and Image Upload
description: Verify that users can create and edit resumes with multiple dynamic sections (career, education, languages, certifications), add/remove entries, and upload images successfully.

steps.description: Login as individual user and navigate to resume creation page
Select a resume template
Add career section entry with valid data
Add education section entry
Add language proficiency section
Add certifications section entry
Upload profile image using presigned URL to MinIO storage
Confirm that image upload succeeds and image preview displays correctly
Remove one dynamic section entry
Submit resume form
Verify resume is saved with correct dynamic content and image references

title: Form Validation for Resume and Company Profile Editing
description: Ensure all forms for resume editing and company profile editing validate inputs rigorously using Zod schemas, blocking invalid submissions and showing error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to resume editing page
Enter invalid data such as empty required fields or invalid formats
Attempt to submit the form
Check that validation errors are displayed and submission is prevented
Navigate to company profile edit page
Input invalid or incomplete company information
Submit company profile form
Verify form displays validation errors and blocks submission

title: Company Job Posting Creation, Edit, Delete and Retrieval
description: Test full lifecycle of job posting management for companies: creating, editing, deleting job posts with extensive job criteria and location integration.

steps.description: Login as company user and navigate to job posting creation page
Fill in job details including title, description, requirements, employment info, and location
Submit job post
Verify job post is created and listed in company job posts
Select an existing job post and edit its details
Submit updates
Confirm updates are saved and reflected accurately
Delete a job posting
Verify job post is removed from the list and backend

title: Career Diagnosis Multi-step Survey Workflow
description: Validate the complete career diagnosis tool workflow including multi-step survey, progress bar updates, store state changes in Zustand, and final result display.

steps.description: Login as individual user and navigate to career diagnosis tool
Complete first step of survey with valid inputs
Verify progress bar updates to next step correctly
Proceed through all subsequent steps filling required data
Ensure Zustand store holds correct survey progress and data
Submit final step
Check that career diagnosis result is displayed correctly

title: Admin User, Company, and Job Post Management with Pagination and CRUD
description: Ensure admin dashboard enables managing users, companies, and job posts correctly with list views, pagination, and full CRUD operations.

steps.description: Login as admin and open admin dashboard
Navigate to user management view
Verify list of users is displayed with pagination controls
Create, edit, and delete a user and verify all changes persist
Switch to company management page
Perform CRUD operations on a company entity and validate backend and UI consistency
Go to job posts management
Paginate through job posts and execute CRUD actions on a job post
Confirm all admin actions reflect accurately in system state

title: Token Management and Role-Based Access Control Validation
description: Verify that authentication tokens are correctly issued, refreshed automatically, stored respecting 'remember me' preferences, and that role-based access control restricts routes properly.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials and observe token issuance
Check token is stored in correct storage based on remember me option
Simulate token expiry to trigger automatic refresh
Confirm fresh token is received and stored without explicit user action
Attempt access to routes permitted to the logged-in user's role
Verify access is granted
Attempt access to routes outside user role permission
Confirm access is denied with redirect or error message

title: Image Upload to MinIO Using Presigned URLs
description: Validate the complete image upload process using presigned URLs to MinIO storage including success, failure, and linking images to user profiles or resumes.

steps.description: Trigger image upload workflow from resume or profile edit form
Request presigned URL from backend
Verify presigned URL is received and valid
Upload image file to MinIO via presigned URL
Confirm successful upload with 200 response
Verify uploaded image is linked and displayed correctly in UI
Simulate upload failure (e.g., invalid URL or network error)
Check appropriate error notification is shown

title: Responsive UI Behavior and Accessibility Checks
description: Test that all core UI components including forms, modals, dropdowns, and navigation respond correctly on various screen sizes and meet accessibility standards.

steps.description: Open application on desktop viewport and test navigation, form input, modal opening/closing, and dropdown selection
Verify correct layout, alignment, and element visibility
Resize or simulate tablet viewport and repeat UI interactions
Confirm UI adjusts appropriately without broken elements or hidden content
Simulate mobile viewport and perform similar UI actions
Check responsive mobile layout and accessible keyboard navigation support
Run automated accessibility audits on major UI pages
Ensure no critical accessibility violations exist

title: API Error Handling and Toast Notification Display
description: Ensure that errors returned from API calls in various workflows trigger appropriate toast notifications and user-friendly error messages.

steps.description: Simulate API failure (e.g., 500 server error) during user login
Verify toast displays error message communicating login failure
Simulate API failure during resume submission
Confirm user sees error notification and form is not submitted
Simulate job post creation failure due to backend error
Ensure error toast is shown and UI handles error gracefully
